patthana15.51:1.1: Anupādinnaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinno nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana15.51:2.1: Anupādinnaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinno naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Abyākatamūlaṃ ekaṃyeva paccayavasena.)
